rooms.title: I stole this from Zed
rooms.description: Pikachu, Beedrill, Raticate, Raticate, Bulbasaur, Weedle, Charmeleon, Raticate, Charmeleon, Pidgeot
hints: Time to look up the Dex!
How many letters in the alphabet?

rooms.title: I stole this from DarkNet at DefCon
rooms.description: ZeroAltitude has an unholy love for prime numbers. He has the first million memorized. To communicate in his language, you need to give him the 34293rd prime number.
